item.description:
So, you think you can bowl, do you? I'd like to see you try with smaller balls and pins that defy gravity. That's right ... I'm talking 'bout candlepin at Sacco's in Davis Square! Since the last time we were there, Sacco's has undergone a complete renovation and added Flatbread pizza.

Let's meet at 6:00 pm to choose sides and play a few games ... then we'll head over to Flatbread and chow down! If you managed to grab one of the BuyWithMe coupons for Sacco's that was offered in September, you'll be golden. Bring your voucher.



11/11/2010 UPDATE: If you want to participate in this event, you must pay $6.00 in advance via Paypal to get on the RSVP 'yes' list. Starting at 9:00 am on Friday, 11/12/2010, you can send an email to akaeze@gmail.com and I will send you a Paypal request for payment. The first 8 people to contact me AND pay will join us at Sacco's on Saturday. First preference will be given to people already on the waiting list.

Anor
item.name: Bowling for Pizza at Sacco's
